What is this: Cryptoraves is a Twitte-based crypto transfer application
How do I get my tokens: You can go to the withdraw page and follow the instructions there
How do I send tokens: Follow our Step-by-Step Instruction guide here
How do I check my balance: Type your twitter handle in the search bar and press enter
How does this work: Cryptoraves is built on a layer 2 sidechain, so no fees. It reads tweets and sends valid ones along to our smart contracts. The website reads that data directly from the blockchain
Where are my personal tokens: The personal tokens feature is being rebuilt and will be re-introduced when complete
